videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 164 g (5.8 oz) (including batteries and SD memory card)
meteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 1.1 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 6), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: Two LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries Two FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries Two EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries (available separately) AC Adapter EH-65A (available separately)
stillpictures: Approx. 320 shots when using alkaline batteries Approx. 950 shots when using lithium batteries Approx. 570 shots when using EN-MH2 batteries
movierecordingactualbatterylifeforrecord: Approx. 1 h 5 min when using alkaline batteries Approx. 2 h 45 min when using lithium batteries Approx. 1 h 40 min when using EN-MH2 batteries
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual picture)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 80 cm (2 ft 8 in.) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 10 cm (4 in.) (wide-angle position relative to the triangle mark) to infinity (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 95.4 x 60.3 x 29.0 mm (3.8 x 2.4 x 1.2 in.) (excluding projections)
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)
whitebalance: Auto, Cloudy (Preset), Daylight / Sunny (Preset), Flash (Preset), Fluorescent (Preset), Incandescent (Preset)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
shootingmodes: Easy auto, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Pet portrait), Smart portrait, Auto
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual picture)
flashfunctions: Auto Flash, Fill-in Flash, Flash Off
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 520 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
motionblurreduction: Electronic VR (still pictures), motion detection (still pictures)
optionalaccessories: AC Adapter EH-65A, USB Cable UC-E16, Audio Video Cable EG-CP14, Battery Charger MH-72 (includes two EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries), Battery Charger MH-73 (includes four EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries), Rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2-B2 (set of two EN-MH2 batteries), Rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2-B4 (set of four EN-MH2 batteries)
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; approx. 20.48 million total pixels
